data.message: #Freedomofspeech everyone really needs to remember that and we all have our own opinions which may not be the same as others but in order to grow as a country instead of bashing each other (or one in particular) maybe we should stop and try to understand.... Because life isn't one sided clearly allot of people are here and  all matter.

replies.message: True and although im a trump supoorter, i don't stop listening to musicians who are against him,  cause everyone is entitled to their opinion , but for him to give his middle finger to Trump supporters is fuc k ed up. His fans are some of the most loyal fans ever
Everyone lately has been really touchy with their feelings but yet in order to have the change they want, we need to change the way we do things....
